reviewText: not what I expected. The stories are good but boring for the kids.  they kept asking for the other movie I had instead. hard to keep kids attention on the story.
Great deal, on time, no problems. I would buy from this seller again.
I think the animation could of been better. NEST FAMILY. Is a good bible animation. Turn it of 5 minutes after watching it. It was a mix of stick and clay animation.

Looks like it was recorded from an old and dated VHS version.  I bought several products for the grandkids and found the following to hold their interest a lot better (Read and Share series):

http://www.amazon.com/s/ref=nb_sb_ss_i_0_14?url=search-alias%3Daps&field-keywords=read+and+share+dvd+bible&sprefix=read+and+share&ih=13_1_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_1.93_570&fsc=6
